translations: 令人沮丧的，令人忧愁的；造成萧条的
（使）沮丧；（使经济）萧条；降低（价值或工资）（depress 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: I found the whole business very depressing.
sentences.translation: 我觉得整件事令人沮丧。

sentences.sentence: Yesterday's unemployment figures were as depressing as those of the previous 22 months.
sentences.translation: 昨天的失业数字和前22个月的一样令人沮丧。

sentences.sentence: That was one of the most depressing experiences of my life. I was bored out of my mind after five minutes.
sentences.translation: 那是我一生中最沮丧的经历之一。5分钟后我就觉得无聊透顶了。
